home.title: Logo Library
home.description: A collection of logos for Libyan banks and payment methods. Available in mono, branded, and logomark variants.

apps.title: App UI Gallery
apps.description: Explore user interface patterns from real Libyan banking applications. Curated screenshots for research and inspiration.

contributors.bookmarkDescription: This might be the last time we meet. Save the website and bookmark it now to ensure you always have access to these assets.
contributors.contributeDescription: Notice a missing bank or outdated logo? Become a contributor and add it to the collection.
